MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G11 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Partick Bridge Street and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:55pm due to a damaged underground cable and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 3pm on Wednesday, 20 January 2021.
